articles.description: “I’ve played with players that have done what he does... The Chicharitos, the Ole Gunnar Solskjaers."
articles.content:
Rio Ferdinand has compared Liverpool attacker Divock Origi to former Manchester United duo Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Javier Hernandez.
The Liverpool star is in good form of late. He scored a vital la… [+2309 chars]

articles.title: Newcastle told three January deals they need - with Man Utd outcast first - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Newcastle have been told to prioritise the Jesse Lingard transfer in January, as well as two other deals, if they want to avoid relegation.
articles.content:
Newcastle have been told to prioritise the Jesse Lingard transfer in the January window, as well as two other deals, if they want to avoid relegation from the Premier League.

articles.author: Miriah Davis, Charlie Coe, Sam McPhee
articles.title: Tennis Australia lists Novak Djokovic in Australian Open entry list amid strict vaccination policy - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Australian Open has included Novak Djokovic in the competition's entry list, and he is expected to pursue a medical exemption to compete in the grand slam as a loophole.
articles.content:
The Australian Open has included Novak Djokovic in the competition's entry list, despite the government insisting he can't play unless he is vaccinated.
The world No.1 expected to pursue a medical e… [+5047 chars]

articles.title: Highlights: Sunderland v Morecambe - Sunderland AFC
articles.description: Sunderland extended their unbeaten run to five games in Sky Bet League One with an emphatic win over Morecambe on Tuesday night.

articles.author: Adam Guillen Jr.
articles.title: UFC 269 ‘Embedded’ video, Ep. 2: ‘We’ve pursued this belt for 11 years’ - MMA Mania
articles.description: Watch UFC 269 “Embedded” video blog episode two for the ESPN+-streamed pay-per-view (PPV) event this Saturday night (Dec. 11, 2021), featuring a Lightweight title fight between Charles Oliveira and Dustin Poirier.
